editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-166r: Psalter. F-149v: 151 Psalms of David. The word for God is not rubricated. The midpoint is marked by a small cross in the outer margin. The spiritual meaning of the Hebrew letters in Psalm 118 is not given; only the names of the letters are rubricated. Psalm 151 is an alternative long version. F-160r: Biblical Canticles. The fourth canticle is "Prayer of Hana, mother of Samuel, prophet." F-165r: Song of Songs, common edition. F-174v: Praises of Mary, arranged for the days of the week: Monday (166r), Tuesday (166v), Wednesday (168r), Thursday (169v), Friday (171b), Saturday (172v), Sunday (173v). F-178v: Gate of Light. Varia: : Prayer in Amharic and Ge'ez for deliverance from various ills. F-4r: Hymn to Our Lady, "Rejoice, Mary, to Adam's pasch." : Miracle of Gabra Manfas Qedus. (with information from Macomber catalogue)

extent.measure: ff. 179; 1 col (ff. 5-166) and 2 cols (ff. 167-178); 16 to 21 lines

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
